name: Robo Desert
description:
Controls  -  Controller Only

Left Stick - Moves

A/X/SouthButton - Jump

X/Square/WestButton - Punch

This was another game Jam entry that was open and just allowed us to create what we want. After struggling thinking of ideas I eventually decided to create a 3D platformer. I did this to get good practice in 3rd person as I have never done it before.

It proved really tough and there is a lot to improve on but I have learned so much doing it. 

All the models, textures and sound effects used were found online and free to use. I did however create everything else within the week including the music.
